text:
- [ Crowd Moaning, Laughing ]
- Goddamn it.
Time!

Relax.Just do
what we talked about.
Don't look at the green.

Make contact with the ball.
There's no goalie to block it.
It's all in the hip. Hey.

It's all in-- Come on.
Work with me now.

It's all in the hips.
Yeah.

It's all in the hips.
It's all in the hips.

[ Chuckles ]
Get off of me!
Just easin' the tension, baby.

Just easin' the tension.
Well, ease it
on someone else.

[ Crowd Shouts ]
Oh!

[ Man ] Look at
the height of that.!
[ All Chattering ]

What the hell?
[ Crowd Shouts ]
[ Crowd Cheering ]

Come on. Good.
Now we just worry
about putting, huh?

Oh, yeah. Putting.
[ Cheering Continues ]

All right.
Remember what I said, huh?

Just use your shoulders
to push the ball,
not your arms.

Don't break the wrist,
and bring that putter back--
Whoa. Whoa.

You're confusing me.
Just let me put
the ball in the hole.
All right.

- [ Crowd Moans ]
- [ Woman ]
Oh, my.
This guy kiddin'?
[ Crowd Whispering, Laughing ]
This is pathetic.
[ Crowd Laughing, Chattering ]

- Yeah!
- There you go. Good shot!

- It's about time.
- It is about time. I couldn't
get the ball in the hole.

I wanted to,
but I couldn't do it.

- [ Man ]
Hey.! What're you doin'?
- [ Crowd Shouts ]
That's, uh--
[ Crowd Shouting Excitedly ]

He shoots, he scores!
[ Crowd Applauding, Cheering ]

Oh, man, that was
so much easier than putting.

I should just try
to get the ball
in one shot every time.

Good plan.
[ Chuckling ]
